root.name: Etch a Sketch
root.description: The classic drawing toy es to life!Product InformationThe timeless drawing toy Etch A Sketch es out of the classic red box andes alive on your puter screen! Grizelda the witch has shaken things up inthe Land of Aha and Knobby needs your help. Experience the World’s FavoriteDrawing Toy as you use your mouse to sketch unique masterpieces and help Knobbyon his quest in adventure mode.Product Features Conquer Knobby’s Quest and draw your way through the Land of Aha! Print or Send and share your pictures from Color Etch and Classic Etch with family and friends! Spring through Knobby’s Bounce and its three fun arcade game play modes! 78 levels of etching fun Minimum Requirements Windows XP Vista Pentium II 600 MHz processor 256 MB of RAM 104 MB free Hard Drive space DirectX 7.0 or higher DirectX patible 16 or 32 bit Video Card with 64 MB VRAM Direct Sound patible Sound Card CD-ROM drive
